headline: Target New Leaders, Not Old In Early Stages Of Uptrend
summary: Investors may develop a bias toward prior market leaders, giving them false hope the stocks will return to their prior glory days.  Four former IBD 50 names that had topped the elite list but no longer meet the stringent criteria include: Nvidia stock, Arista Networks, AppLovin and Dutch Bros. These names have fallen below their 10-week moving averages while institutions have unloaded shares.  Investors may be tempted to buy these prior leaders as they rise and form new bases as the stock market improves.
